prompts: Create a gooey Pokemon with a mischievous smile and vibrant green color.
I want a toxic-type creature that oozes with purple sludge and has a playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies pollution, with a blobby form and striking blue accents.
Make a monster that lurks in the shadows, featuring a ghostly appearance and a menacing grin.
Imagine a Pokemon made of slime, with features that suggest it can absorb its surroundings.
Design a creature that thrives in urban environments, showcasing a unique blend of green and blue.
Show me a Pokemon that is both playful and sneaky, with a distinctive ooze-like body.
